I am a PhD student in the [Jordaan Fisheries and Aquatic Ecology Lab](https://www.headwaters-to-ocean.org/) and the [Organismic and Evolutionary Biology](https://gpls.cns.umass.edu/oeb) program at the University of Massachusetts Amherst. I am interested in the movement of marine and aquatic organisms and how this impacts ecological interactions.
